entry.title: Creating a Blog and Custom Theme Using Pelican
entry.summary:
TLDR

Pelican is a static site generator (built on python) that I have seen primarily used to create blogs. It is the project I used to build this site. Source code is available here.

Topics:
  • How I built my site
  • Creating a custom theme
  • Useful things to know about Pelican â€¦
entry.content:
TLDR

Pelican is a static site generator (built on python) that I have seen primarily used to create blogs. It is the project I used to build this site. Source code is available here.

Topics:
  • How I built my site
  • Creating a custom theme
  • Useful things to know about Pelican

What is Pelican?
